participant_1.name: Larry
participant_1.personality: Creative and passionate about food, Larry has a fun-loving nature and enjoys leisure activities like boating. He's also a big fan of comic books.
participant_1.background: hey my name is larry and i'm a chef. if i am not cooking in the kitchen then i am definitely on the water. l also love comic books. spiderman is my favorite.

participant_2.name: Jessica
participant_2.personality: Jessica is practical and nurturing, balancing her career in banking with her expanding family. She's excited about the future and enjoys home life.
participant_2.background: i'm an omnivore. i am expecting twins in two months. i work at a bank. i just bought my first home. a already have a children.

content.text: I work at a bank. What do you do?
